description: Mondeca delivers software and services based on semantic technologies.  We help our clients bridge the gap between the human language and what the computers understand.  In more technical terms, we deliver taxonomy management, content auto-tagging and knowledge visualisation standard software, as well as business specific applications based on semantic technologies.  Our areas of expertise include natural language processing, graph data, taxonomy management, extraction of information from various media, automatic categorization and classification, search, inferencing and many others.
name: Mondeca
